sourcing.instructions:
Erbium can be sourced from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces specializing in rare earth metals. 
 Scandium is available through chemical suppliers or rare earth metal distributors. 
 Silicon can be found at electronic component suppliers or chemical supply stores. 
 Tin is commonly available at hardware stores or metal supply shops.
